reviews.text: 12030 Mimosa Ln, Frisco, TX 75036 This recent cold snap is a good reminder to prep your home for the winter. Keep your home safe and warm with these quick tips: 1️⃣ Insulate outdoor & attic pipes 2️⃣ Seal doors and windows 3️⃣ Service your heater or furnace 4️⃣ Clean gutters & trim trees 5️⃣ Stock up for power outages A little prep now can save big headaches later! 💪 🔧 Need help winterizing your home? Call the pros at VIP General Contractors — we’ve got you covered. #northtexashomes #WinterPrep

"Great customer service and staff, would highly recommend" "Amazing service and awesome people!" "They brought in two crews the day of the work and finished very quickly."

My home recently received extensive hail damage. VIP delivered the needed repairs, with quality and professional detail. Communication through the process was excellent. I would not hesitate to use VIP for future needs. More Response from the owner a month ago Thank you so much for such a positive review! Extensive hail damage is our specialty and we were glad we were able to quickly and professionally repair your roof! We appreciate your comment about having excellent communication-We know you

I am beyond happy with VIP! They were timely, did what they said they were going to do, and kept me updated throughout the project! I would 100% recommend VIP!!!! You can't go wrong! More Response from the owner a month ago Thank you! We know you had a lot of companies to choose from after the storm hit Anna and Melissa  so we appreciate your business!

Sam and Sean, we’re very consultative and informative in their approach. They provided good recommendations. My wife and I were very pleased with the discussion of the options for our roofing and gutter project.
